channel.title: Help with shops :)
channel.description: I have two questions about shops. How do you price the items in your shops and ((((((((how do you put a shop onto certain cords so you dont have to spawn the npcs when you start the server?))))))))) :| (((question)))=IMPORTANT question

item.title: Help with shops :)
item.dc:creator: @ix_fish_xi ix fish xi
item.description:
@ix_fish_xi wrote:

ok
to answer number one

You would open up shops.cfg
Search for the item you want. EG fire_cape
Then change the first 3 numbers

to answer the second question

You would open up autospawn.cfg
then put this is but change it to what you need it to be

spawn = NPCID	XCOORD	YCOORD	HEIGHT	0	0	0	0	0	2

Put the npcâ€™s id where i put NPCID
Put the x and the y coordinates where i put XCOORD & YCOORD
Then put the height that you want it to be at in HEIGHT

Read full topic
